Plot: A cowardly boy who buries himself in accident statistics enters a library to escape a storm only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real life.
Title: The Pagemaster
Writer: David Kirschner (story), David Casci (story), David Casci (screenplay), David Kirschner (screenplay), Ernie Contreras (screenplay)
Actors: Macaulay Culkin, Kanin Howell, Alexis Kirschner, Jessica Kirschner
